uniequip_002_chen2.name: Frugality
uniequip_002_chen2.upgradeDescription: When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have {chance} chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have 10% chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

uniequip_002_chen2.name: Frugality
uniequip_002_chen2.upgradeDescription: When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have {chance} <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have 10% chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

uniequip_002_aosta.name: Sharp Nails
uniequip_002_aosta.upgradeDescription: Attacks inflict Bleed to unblocked enemies, dealing {%ATK} ATK as Arts damage (unaffected by trait) every second for {bleed_duration} seconds

uniequip_002_ABCDEF.upgradeDescription: Can summon Cherry-3 to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; Cherry-3 will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated and create Debris in the 4 surrounding tiles; Debris HP + {%HP}
Can summon Cherry-3 to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; Cherry-3 will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated and create Debris in the 4 surrounding tiles; Debris HP + {%HP}

uniequip_003_swire2.name: Cash Claps Calamity
uniequip_003_swire2.upgradeDescription: Upon receiving lethal damage, as long as enough DP is available, consumes {DP_cost} DP to restore this unit's HP to 70%; the cost of this Talent doubles every time it is activated

uniequip_003_mostma.name: Skill Aura - Caster
uniequip_003_mostma.upgradeDescription: When deployed, increases the SP recovery rate of all Casters by {caster_SP}/second (only the highest effect of this type takes place)
